import React, { useState, useContext } from 'react' import "./styles.css" import menuContext from '../context/menuContext'; const Menu = () => { const { addMenu } = useContext(menuContext); const [menu, setMenu] = useState({ name: "", category: "", menus: "", description: "" }) const categories = ["Chinese", "Italian", "Indian", "Beverages"]; const [selectedCategory, setSelectedCategory] = useState(""); // State for the selected category const handleCategorySelect = (category) => { setSelectedCategory(category); // Update the selected category when an item is selected } const handleClick = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); addMenu(menu.name, selectedCategory, menu.menus, menu.description); setMenu({ name: "", category: "", menus: "", description: "" }); } const onChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setMenu({ ...menu, [name]: value }); } return (

  • handleCategorySelect(category)} value={category}> {category}

) } export default Menu
